entry.title: Mailing list mode
entry.summary: The email content highlights the current limitations of a mailing list, emphasizing that no one can respond to messages until a certain "AJ" enables the reply feature. The term "keep up" refers specifically to reading new replies or threads through email. The functionality for writing or using the mailing list in its full capacity is pending activation, which is necessary for users to engage fully with the mailing list platform.
